alert.note: Alert for Callahan; Jones; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 6:28PM CDT until June 17 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Callahan County in west central Texas... Southern Jones County in west central Texas... Northern Taylor County in west central Texas... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, New severe thunderstorms were developing near Merkel, moving east at 30 mph. These storms will also be capable or producing quarter size hail and 60 mph winds as they track east along the Interstate towards Abilene. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... View around 635 PM CDT. Tye, Dyess Afb and Caps around 640 PM CDT. Wylie around 645 PM CDT. Hawley around 650 PM CDT. Abilene and Potosi around 655 PM CDT. Hamby and Nugent around 700 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Impact, Hodges, Lake Fort Phantom Hill, Kirby Lake, Stith and Truby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 261 and 293. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
